items.sentence: Tom wasn't able to make himself understood in French.
Tom was difficult to get along with, but Mary wasn't.
Tom was finished doing that by 2:30, but Mary wasn't.
Tom says that he isn't going to answer any questions.
Thanks to Tom we were able to get the job done early.
Tom has both an alto saxophone and a tenor saxophone.
Why don't you ask Tom if what he said is really true?
We've spent over three hours discussing this already.
Tom has already been told he doesn't have to do that.
Do you happen to know if there is an ATM around here?
I thought you said that you weren't afraid of ghosts.
I'll lend you this book if you return it next Monday.
The store offers special discounts during the summer.
After we finish doing this, you can do what you want.
I want to buy the same kind of bicycles that Tom has.
I thought you said that I could spend the night here.
Tom spent a lot of time talking to Mary at the party.
If it's all right with you, I'll leave when Tom does.
I lived in a French-speaking country for three years.
Tom lost his new umbrella the day after he bought it.
